cards.Name: Koda - Talkative Cub
cards.Flavor_Text: "I mean, I don't want to brag or nothing, but I got some moves."
cards.Body_Text: Tell Everybody: During opponents' turns, you can't lost lore.

cards.Name: Nala - Mischievous Cub
cards.Flavor_Text:
The Lorcana Hide-and-Seek Championship was
hers for the taking.

cards.Name: Prince Naveen - Ukulele Player
cards.Body_Text: Singer 6 (This-character counts as cost6 {i} to sing songs.) It's Beautiful, No?: When you play this character, you may play a song with cost 6 or less for free.

cards.Name: Rutt - Northern Moose
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Let's find some nice twigs, eh? I could use a
snack!"

cards.Name: Kenai - Big Brother
cards.Flavor_Text:
"You have to look after your little brother, no matter
how big a pain he is."
-Kenai
cards.Body_Text: Brothers Forever: While this character is exerted, your characters named Koda can't be challenged.

cards.Name: Vanellope von Schweetz - Sugar Rush Champ
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Look, the code may say I'm a princess, but I know
who I really am ... ."

cards.Name: Tuke - Northern Moose
cards.Flavor_Text: "I'd love a snack, but I'm kinda tied up right now."

cards.Name: Lilo - Junior Cake Decorator
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Peanut butter and pineapple! This'll be the best
cake ever!"
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you
may add their {s} to another chosen character's
{s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Vanellope von Schweetz - Candy Mechanic
cards.Flavor_Text:
"I'll take whatever you've got... as long as it's got
sugar in it."
cards.Body_Text: You've Got To Pay To Play:Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -1{s} until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Fix-It Felix, Jr. - Trusty Builder
cards.Flavor_Text: "Golly, this place is going to take some real fixing!"
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted.
An opposing character who challenges one of
your characters must choose one with Bodyguard
if able.)

cards.Name: Gazelle - Pop Star
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Good evening, Lorcana! We're here tonight to
celebrate what's possible when we stand together
as one."
cards.Body_Text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing
songs.)

cards.Name: Fix-It Felix, Jr. - Niceland Steward
cards.Body_Text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Fix-lt Felix, Jr.) Building Together: Your locations get +2 {w}.

cards.Name: Kristoff - Reindeer Keeper
cards.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)  Song Of The Herd: For each song card in your discard, you pay 1{i} less to play this character.

cards.Name: Mirabel Madrigal - Family Gatherer
cards.Flavor_Text: "There's nothing we can't accomplish together!"
cards.Body_Text: Not Without My Family: You can't play this character unless you have 5 or more characters in play.

cards.Name: Minnie Mouse - Drum Major
cards.Body_Text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i}  to play this on top of one of your characters named Minnie Mouse.) Parade Order: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, you may search your deck for a character card and reveal that card to all players. Shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

cards.Name: Daisy Duck - Donald's Date
cards.Body_Text: Big Prize: Whenever this character quests, each opponent reveals the top card of their deck. If it's a character card, they may put it into their hand. Otherwise, they put it on the bottom of their deck.

cards.Name: Fix-It Felix, Jr. - Delighted Sightseer
cards.Flavor_Text: "l don't think I've ever seen anything as sweet as this."
cards.Body_Text: Oh, My Land!: When you play this character, if you have a location in play, draw a card.

cards.Name: Moana - Determined Explorer
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Investigate every port of the Illuminary, find the
chromicons, restore the Illuminary, how hard con
it-wait, what was that noise?"

cards.Name: Vanellope von Schweetz - Sugar Rush Princess
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2{i} to play this on top of one of
your characters named Vanellope von Schweetz.)
I HEREBY DECREE: Whenever you play another
Princess character, all opposing characters get -1{s}
until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Alan-a-Dale - Rockin' Rooster
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Thank you! Now here's o little ditty for our floodborn
friends that we call 'Martin and the Flood.'"
cards.Body_Text: Fan Favorite: Whenever you play a song, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Wreck-It Ralph - Admiral Underpants
cards.Flavor_Text: If he must give a victory speech, he'll keep it brief.
cards.Body_Text: I've Got The Coolest Friend: When you play  this character, return a character card from your discard to your hand. If that card is a Princess character card, gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Maid Marian - Lady of the Lists
cards.Flavor_Text:
"And who might you be, my knight and
champion?"

cards.Name: Sven - Reindeer Steed
cards.Body_Text: Reindeer Games: When you play this character, you may ready chosen character. They can't quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Minnie Mouse - Compassionate Friend
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Oh my! Is that part of the Illuminary? I have to
go help!"
cards.Body_Text:
Patch Them Up: Whenever this character quests,
you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen
character.

cards.Name: Try Everything
cards.Flavor_Text: I want to try even though I could fail
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this song for
free.)
Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character and ready
them. They can't quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Healing Touch
cards.Flavor_Text:
"The heart is not so easily changed, but the head can
be persuaded."
-Grand Pabbie
cards.Body_Text:
Remove up to 4 damage from chosen character.
Draw a card.

cards.Name: Revive
cards.Flavor_Text: Not all that is lost is gone forever.
cards.Body_Text:
Play a character with cost 5 or less from your
discard for free.

cards.Name: Blast From Your Past
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 6 or more can {e} to sing this
song for free.)
Name a card. Return all character cards with that
name from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Invited to the Ball
cards.Body_Text:
Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put revealed
character cards into your hand. Put the rest on the
bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Healing Decanter
cards.Body_Text:
Renewing Essence: {e} - Remove up to 2 damage
from chosen character.

cards.Name: Queen's Sensor Core
cards.Body_Text:
Symbol Of Nobility: At the start of your turn, if you have a
Princess or Queen character in play, gain 1 lore.
Royal Search: {e}, 2{i} - Reveal the top card of your deck.
If it's a Princess or Queen character card, you may put it into
your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

cards.Name: Amber Chromicon
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Comfort the weak and weary."
-Inscription
cards.Body_Text:
Amber Light: {e} - Remove up to 1 damage from each
of your characters.

cards.Name: Rapunzel's Tower - Secluded Prison
cards.Flavor_Text:
"It's a scary world out there."
-Mother Gothel
cards.Body_Text: Safe And Sound: Characters get +3{w} while here.

cards.Name: Pride Lands - Jungle Oasis
cards.Body_Text:
Our Humble Home: While you have 3 or more characters here, you may
banish this location to play a character from your discard for free.

cards.Name: Maleficent - Formidable Queen
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6{i} to play this on top of one of
your characters named Maleficent.)
Listen Well, All Of You: When you play this character,
for each of your characters named Maleficent in play,
return a chosen opposing character, item, or location
with cost 3 or less to their player's hand.

cards.Name: The Nokk - Mythical Spirit
cards.Body_Text:
Turning Tides: When you play this character,
you may move up to 2 damage counters from
chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Cogsworth - Illuminary Watchman
cards.Flavor_Text: "Step to it! Time is of the essence."
cards.Body_Text:
Move It!: When you play this character,
chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can
challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Merlin - Turtle
cards.Flavor_Text: "Don't rush me, now-this is important."
cards.Body_Text:
Give Me Time To Think: When you play this
character and when he leaves play, look at the
top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of
your deck and the other on the bottom.

cards.Name: Archimedes - Exasperated Owl
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Hmph. What does on owl have to do to get a little
peace and quiet around here?"
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can
challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Bruni - Fire Salamander
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can
challenge this character.)
Parting Gift: When this character is banished,
you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Earth Giant - Living Mountain
cards.Flavor_Text: Who woke up the big guy?
cards.Body_Text:
Unearthed: When you play this character, each
opponent draws a card.

cards.Name: Gale - Wind Spirit
cards.Body_Text:
Recurring Gust: When this character is
banished in a challenge, return this card to your
hand.

cards.Name: White Rabbit - Royal Herald
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Oh me, oh my! Did a piece just fall off the
Illuminary?! I've got to tell someone before it's too
late, late, late!"

cards.Name: Madam Mim - Elephant
cards.Body_Text:
A Little Game: When you play this character, banish
her or return another chosen character of yours to your
hand.
Sneaky Move: At the start of your turn, you may move
up to 2 damage counters from this character to chosen
opposing character.

cards.Name: Luisa Madrigal - Entertaining Muscle
cards.Flavor_Text:
"This is just o worm-up, folks! Wait 'til you see the
big finale!"

cards.Name: Anna - Mystical Majesty
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of
one of your characters named Anna.)
Exceptional Power: When you play this
character, exert all opposing characters.

cards.Name: Archimedes - Electrified Owl
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your
characters named Archimedes.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this
character.)
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3{s}.)

cards.Name: Elsa - The Fifth Spirit
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this
character.)
Crystallize: When you play this character, exert chosen
opposing character.

cards.Name: Genie - Main Attraction
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Keep your eyes on me, folks! It's time for a little
prestidigitation!"
cards.Body_Text:
Phenomenal Showman: While this character is
exerted, opposing characters can't ready at the
start of their turn.

cards.Name: Olaf - Happy Passenger
cards.Body_Text:
Clear The Path: For each exerted character
opponents have in play, you pay 1{i} less to
play this character.
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can
challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Maleficent - Vexed Partygoer
cards.Body_Text:
What An Awkward Situation: Whenever this
character quests, you may choose and discard a
card to return chosen character, item, or location
with cost 3 or less to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Monstro - Whale of a Whale
cards.Flavor_Text:
The great beast breached the surface of the
Azurite Sea, and the cry went out, "Monstro!
Monstro!"

cards.Name: Magica De Spell - Cruel Sorceress
cards.Body_Text:
Playing With Power: During opponents' turns,
if an effect would cause you to discard one or
more cards from your hand, you don't discard.

cards.Name: Maleficent - Vengeful Sorceress
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Evidently my invitation was lost. How dreadful.
Here, let me help with the decorations..."

cards.Name: Rafiki - Shaman Duelist
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character con challenge the turn
they're played.)
Surprising Skill: When you play this character,
he gains Challenger +4 this turn. (They get +4
while challenging.)

cards.Name: Anna - Eager Acolyte
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Okay, I con totally move small stuff. I need
something bigger... Where's Kristoff's sled?"
cards.Body_Text:
Growing Powers: When you play this character,
each opponent chooses and exerts one of their
ready characters.

cards.Name: King of Hearts - Monarch of Wonderland
cards.Flavor_Text: "By order of the king. You heard what she said!"
cards.Body_Text:
Pleasing The Queen: {e} - Chosen exerted
character can't ready at the start of their next
turn.

cards.Name: Camilo Madrigal - Family Copycat
cards.Body_Text:
Imitate: Whenever this character quests, you
may gain lore equal to the {l} of chosen other
character of yours. Return that character to your
hand.

cards.Name: Hypnotic Strength
cards.Flavor_Text:
Suddenly, Basil felt a strong desire to find the broken
crown.
cards.Body_Text:
Draw a card. Chosen character gains Challenger +2
this turn. (They get +2{s}  while challenging.)

cards.Name: Finders Keepers
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Three wishes, comin' right up!"
-Iago
cards.Body_Text: Draw 3 cards.

cards.Name: We Know The Way
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for
free.)
Shuffle chosen card from your discard into your deck.
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it has the same name
as the chosen card, you may play the revealed card for free.
Otherwise, put it into your hand.

cards.Name: Gathering Knowledge And Wisdom
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Just think! All this knowledge was under our noses the
whole time. We only had to look in the right place."
cards.Body_Text: Gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Magical Aid
cards.Flavor_Text:
"You've got some power in your corner now!"
-Genie
cards.Body_Text:
Chosen character gains Challenger +3 and "When this
character is banished in a challenge, return this card to
your hand" this turn. (They get +3{s} while challenging.)

cards.Name: Retrosphere
cards.Body_Text:
Extract Of Amethyst: 2{i}, Banish this item - Return
chosen character, item, or location with cost 3 or less
to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Half Hexwell Crown
cards.Flavor_Text: The broken crown holds dark and mysterious powers.
cards.Body_Text:
An unexpected Find: {e}, 2{i} - Draw a card.
A Perilous Power: {e}, 2{i}, Discard a card - Exert
chosen character.

cards.Name: Amethyst Chromicon
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Seek not power for its own sake."
-Inscription
cards.Body_Text: Amethyst Light: {e} - Each player may draw a card.

cards.Name: Elsa's Ice Palace - Place of Solitude
cards.Body_Text:
Eternal Winter: When you play this location, choose an exerted
character. While this location is in play, that character can't ready at the
start of their turn.

cards.Name: The Library - A Gift for Belle
cards.Body_Text:
Lost In A Book: Whenever a character is banished while here, you may
draw a card.

cards.Name: Robin Hood - Timely Contestant
cards.Body_Text:
Tag Me In!: For each 1 damage on opposing characters, you pay 1{i} less to play this character.
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Shenzi - Scar's Accomplice
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Easy Pickings: While challenging a damaged character, this character gets +2{s}.

cards.Name: Little John - Camp Cook
cards.Flavor_Text:
"You're in for a real treat, Rob. Tonight's house
special is my famous outlaw grub. Made from the
finest whatever we could find!"

cards.Name: Zazu - Advisor to Mufasa
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Oh, I guess one quick spin through the lights
won't hurt."
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can
challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Ulf - Mime
cards.Flavor_Text: His performances are unspeakably good.
cards.Body_Text: Silent Performance: This character can't {e} to sing songs.

cards.Name: Ed - Laughing Hyena
cards.Flavor_Text: "A-heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, hee, hee, heeeee."
cards.Body_Text: Cause A Panic: When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.

cards.Name: Flora - Good Fairy
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Don't fuss, dear! A flick of the wrist will turn these
briars into something beautiful."
cards.Body_Text: Fiddle Faddle: While being challenged, this character gets +2{s}.

cards.Name: Merryweather - Good Fairy
cards.Flavor_Text: "The most beautiful color is blue!"
cards.Body_Text:
Ray Of Hope: When you play this character, you
may pay 1{i} to give chosen character +2 {s} this
turn.

cards.Name: Robin Hood - Archery Contestant
cards.Flavor_Text:
"For a second there, I thought this might be a real
challenge."
cards.Body_Text:
Trick Shot: When you play this character, if an
opponent has a damaged character in play, gain 1
lore.

cards.Name: Fauna - Good Fairy
cards.Flavor_Text:
"The secret to a good cake is combining
everything just right. Every ingredient is important,
but the magic is in how they work together."

cards.Name: Iago - Fake Flamingo
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can
challenge this character.)
In Disguise: Whenever this character quests,
you pay 2{i} less for the next action you play this
turn.

cards.Name: Banzai - Gluttonous Predator
cards.Flavor_Text: He won't turn down a quick bite before dinner

cards.Name: Ed - Hysterical Partygoer
cards.Flavor_Text:
As for as he's concerned, there's no such thing as
bad taste.
cards.Body_Text:
Rowdy Guest: Damaged characters can't
challenge this character.

cards.Name: Scroop - Odious Mutineer
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can
challenge this character.)
Do Say Hello To Mr. Arrow: When you play this character, you may pay 3{i} to banish chosen
damaged character.

cards.Name: Prince Phillip - Swordsman of the Realm
cards.Body_Text:
Slayer Of Dragons: When you play this character,
banish chosen opposing Dragon character.
Pressing The Advantage: Whenever he challenges
a damaged character, ready this character after the
challenge.

cards.Name: Clarabelle - Light on Her Hooves
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one
of your characters named Clarabelle.)
Keep In Step: At the end of your turn, if chosen
opponent has more cards in their hand than you, you
may draw cards until you have the same number.

cards.Name: Anna - Diplomatic Queen
cards.Body_Text:
Royal Resolution: When you play this character,
you may pay 2{i} to choose one:
 Each opponent chooses and discards a card.
 Chosen character gets +2{s} this turn.
 Banish chosen damaged character.

cards.Name: Clarabelle - Clumsy Guest
cards.Body_Text:
Butterfingers: When you play this character,
you may pay 2{i}  to banish chosen item.

cards.Name: Banzai - Taunting Hyena
cards.Flavor_Text: "What do we got here, a little snack pock?"
cards.Body_Text:
Here Kitty, Kitty, Kitty: When you play this
character, you may exert chosen damaged
character.

cards.Name: Robin Hood - Sneaky Sleuth
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of
one of your characters named Robin Hood.)
Clever Plan: This character gets +1{l} for each
opposing damaged character in play.

cards.Name: Mother Gothel - Conceited Manipulator
cards.Flavor_Text:
"A beautiful lady never stands meekly at the back
of the line."
cards.Body_Text:
Mother Knows Best: When you play this
character, you may pay 3{i} to return chosen
character to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Clarabelle - Contented Wallflower
cards.Flavor_Text: "Golly! Those dancers can really moo-ve!"
cards.Body_Text:
One Step Behind: When you play this character,
if an opponent has more cards in their hand than
you, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Shenzi - Head Hyena
cards.Body_Text:
Stick Around For Dinner: This character gets +1{s}
for each other Hyena character you have in play.
What Have We Got Here: Whenever one of your
Hyena characters challenges a damaged character,
gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Mother Gothel - Unwavering Schemer
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of
one of your characters named Mother Gothel.)
The World Is Dark: When you play this
character, each opponent chooses one of their
characters and returns that card to their hand.

cards.Name: Scar - Vengeful Lion
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character
except to challenge.)
Life's not fair, is it?: Whenever one of your
characters challenges a damaged character, you
may draw a card.

cards.Name: Hypnotic Deduction
cards.Flavor_Text:
"A security device! Easily defeated, of course. Once I
make room for the crown, l... can ... bring it...
to... him."
cards.Body_Text:
Draw 3 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on the
top of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Night Howler Rage
cards.Flavor_Text:
"I think someone is targeting predators on purpose and
making them go savage!"
-Judy Hopps
cards.Body_Text:
Draw a card. Chosen character gains Reckless during their
next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.Name: You're Welcome
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this
song for free.)
Shuffle chosen character, item, or location into their
player's deck. That player draws 2 cards.

cards.Name: Remember Who You Are
cards.Body_Text:
If chosen opponent has more cards in their hand than
you, draw cards until you have the same number.

cards.Name: Prince John's Mirror
cards.Body_Text:
You Look Regal: If you have a character named Prince
John in play, you pay 1{i} less to play this item.
A Feeling Of Power: At the end of each opponent's
turn, if they have more than 3 cards in their hand, they
discard until they have 3 cards in their hand.

cards.Name: Obscurosphere
cards.Body_Text:
Extract Of Emerald: 2{i}, Banish this item - Your
characters gain Ward until the start of your next turn.
(Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Emerald Chromicon
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Trust in the winds of change."
-Inscription
cards.Body_Text:
Emerald Light: During opponents' turns, whenever
one of your characters is banished, you may return
chosen character to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Sherwood Forest - Outlaw Hideaway
cards.Body_Text:
Forest Home: Your characters named Robin Hood may move here for free.
Familiar Terrain: Characters gain Ward and "{e}, 1{i} - Deal 2 damage to chosen
damaged character" while here. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Tropical Rainforest - Jaguar Lair
cards.Body_Text:
Snack Time: Opposing damaged characters gain Reckless. (They can't
quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.Name: Taffyta Muttonfudge - Ruthless Rival
cards.Flavor_Text: "There's not a glimmer that can keep up with me. You might as well quit now."

cards.Name: Wreck-It Ralph - Demolition Dude
cards.Body_Text: Refreshing Break: Whenever you ready this character, gain 1 lore for each 1 damage on him.

cards.Name: Maximus - Team Champion
cards.Flavor_Text: It's easy to get carried away when it comes to tug of war.
cards.Body_Text: Royally Big Rewards: At the end of your turn, if you have any characters in play with 5{s} or more, gain 2 lore. If you have any in play with 10{s} or more, gain 5 lore instead.

cards.Name: Turbo - Royal Hack
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Game Jump: This character also counts as being named King Candy for Shift.

cards.Name: Donald Duck - Pie Slinger
cards.Body_Text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Donald Duck.) Humble Pie: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, each opponent loses 2 lore. Raging Duck: While an opponent has 10 or more lore, this character gets +6{s}

cards.Name: Rancis Fluggerbutter - Chocolate Charger
cards.Flavor_Text: Ingredients: Butter, sugar, unsweetened chocolate, vanilla, and arrogance.

cards.Name: Scar - Betrayer
cards.Flavor_Text: The second Rule of Villainy: Never settle for second place.
cards.Body_Text: Long Live the King - When you play this character, you may banish chosen character named Mufasa.

cards.Name: Snowanna Rainbeau
cards.Flavor_Text: When it comes to racing, she never gets cold feet.
cards.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Daisy Duck - Spotless Food-Fighter
cards.Flavor_Text: She has an unblemished record.
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Enthusiastic Dancer
cards.Flavor_Text: He loves to share the spotlight with a star like Minnie.
cards.Body_Text: Perfect Partners: While you have a character named Minnie Mouse in play, this character gets +2{s}.

cards.Name: Ratigan - Raging Rat
cards.Flavor_Text: "The world's most diabolical genius should never suffer such indignities!"
cards.Body_Text: Nothing Can Stand in My Way: While this character has damage, he gets +2{s}.

cards.Name: Taffyta Muttonfudge - Crowd Favorite
cards.Flavor_Text: "Never lose sight of where you're going. Second place."
cards.Body_Text: Showstopper: When you play this character, if you have a location in play, each opponent loses 1 lore.

cards.Name: Denahi - Avenging Brother
cards.Flavor_Text: "You'll pay for what you've done! I'll track you all the way to the Azurite Sea if I have to!"

cards.Name: Pete - Steamboat Rival
cards.Body_Text: Scram!: When you play this character, if you have another character named Pete in play, you may banish chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Taffyta Muttonfudge - Sour Speedster
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Taffyta Muttonfudge.)
New Roster: Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Robin Hood - Sharpshooter
cards.Body_Text: My Greatest Performance: Whenever this character quests, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You my reveal an action card with cost 6 or less and play it for free. Put the rest in your discard.

cards.Name: Gaston - Pure Paragon
cards.Body_Text:
A Man Among Men!: For each damaged character you have in play, you pay 2{i} less to play this character.
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Pete - Pastry Chomper
cards.Flavor_Text: His half-baked scheme to whisk away the food almost worked. But in the end, he got his just desserts.

cards.Name: Arthur - Novice Sparrow
cards.Flavor_Text: "Hold it, boy. Not so fast."
cards.Body_Text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

cards.Name: Donald Duck - Daisy's Date
cards.Flavor_Text: He keeps his eye on the prize.
cards.Body_Text: Plucky Play: Whenever this character challenges another character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

cards.Name: Ratigan - Party Crasher
cards.Body_Text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Ratigan.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Delightfully Wicked: Your damaged characters get +2{s}.

cards.Name: Vanellope Von Schweetz - Random Roster Racer
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Pixlexia: When you play this character, she gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.Name: Simba - Adventurous Successor
cards.Body_Text: I Laugh in the Face of Danger: When you play this character, chosen character gets +2{s} this turn.

cards.Name: Minnie Mouse - Dazzling Dancer
cards.Flavor_Text: She doesn't seek the spotlight-the spotlight seeks her.
cards.Body_Text: Dance-Off: Whenever this character or one of your characters named Mickey Mouse challenges another character, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Break Free
cards.Flavor_Text: Tink darted from the shattered lantern in the blink of an eye.
cards.Body_Text: Deal 1 damage to chosen character of yours. They gain Rush and get +1{s} this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Evil Comes Prepared
cards.Body_Text: Ready chosen character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. If a Villain character is chosen, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Don't Let the Frostbite Bite
cards.Flavor_Text: Let's call it a night.
cards.Body_Text: (A character with cost 7 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)  Ready all your characters. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Glimmer VS Glimmer
cards.Flavor_Text:
Hades: "Listen, kid. If I'm gettin' banished back to the lorebook, you're going with me."
Hercules: "We'll see about that."
cards.Body_Text: Banish chosen character of yours to banish chosen character.

cards.Name: Who's With Me?
cards.Flavor_Text: "Don't forget, the purple unicorn is mine!"
cards.Body_Text:
Your characters get +2{s} this turn.
Whenever one of your characters with Reckless challenges another character this turn, gain 2 lore.

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Potion of Might
cards.Body_Text: Vile Concoction: 1{i}, Banish this item - Chosen character gets +3{s} this turn. If a Villain character is chosen, they get +4{s} instead.

cards.Name: The Sword Released
cards.Body_Text: Power Appointed: At the start of your turn, if you have a character in play with more {s} than each opposing character in play, each opponent loses 1 lore and you gain lore equal to the lore lost.

cards.Name: Ruby Chromicon
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Leave fear behind."
-Inscription
cards.Body_Text: Ruby Light: {e} - Chosen character gets +1{s} this turn.

cards.Name: Sugar Rush Speedway - Starting Line
cards.Body_Text: On Your Marks!: Once per turn, you may {e} chosen character here and deal them 1 damage to move them to another location for free.

cards.Name: Ratigan's Party - Seedy Back Room
cards.Body_Text: Misfits' Revelry: While you have a damaged character here, this location gets +2{l}.

cards.Name: King Candy - Sovereign of Sugar
cards.Flavor_Text: "My sweet subjects, I can without a pinch of hesitation assure you that I have never been so happy."

cards.Name: Chaca - Impressive Daughter
cards.Flavor_Text: "Look, look! My tooth is even looser today!"

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: The Queen - Cruelest of All
cards.Flavor_Text: She'd seen what the ink could do for other glimmers. What could it do for her?
cards.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Scrooge McDuck - Afficionado of Antiquities
cards.Flavor_Text: "The secret room should be right here! Ach, I cannot believe I paid a whole penny for this map."

cards.Name: Prince John - Opportunistic Briber
cards.Flavor_Text: "Of course I'm on the list. Check under 'PJ.'"
cards.Body_Text: Taxes Never Fail Me: Whenever you play an item, this character gets +2{s} this turn.

cards.Name: Merlin - Back from Bermuda
cards.Flavor_Text: "A little rest and relaxation will do wonders for your health, boy."
cards.Body_Text: Long Live the King!: Your characters named Arthur gain Resist +1

cards.Name: Pacha - Emperor's Guide
cards.Body_Text:
Helpful Supplies: At the start of your turn, if you have an item in play, gain 1 lore.
Perfect Directions: At the start of your turn, if you have a location in play, gain 1 lore.

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: The Queen - Fairest of All
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named The Queen.)
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Reflections of Vanity: For each other character named The Queen you have in play, this character gets +1{l}.

cards.Name: Sheriff of Nottingham - Bushel Britches
cards.Body_Text:
Every Little Bit Helps: For each item you have in play, you pay 1{i} less to play this character.
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Chicha - Dedicated Mother
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
One on the Way: During your turn, when you put a card into your inkwell, if it's the second card you've put into your inkwell this turn, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Prince John - Gold Lover
cards.Flavor_Text: A villainous schemer from day to night.
cards.Body_Text: Beautiful, Lovely Taxes: {e} - Play an item from your hand or discard with cost 5 or less for free, exerted.

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: The Queen - Crown of the Council
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Gatherer of the Wicked: When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of character cards named The Queen and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Kuzco - Selfish Emperor
cards.Body_Text:
Outplacement: When you play this character, you may put chosen item or location into its player's inkwell facedown and exerted.
By Invite Only: 4{i} - Your other characters gain Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Mufasa - Ruler of Pride Rock
cards.Body_Text:
A Delicate Balance: When you play this character, Exert all cards in your inkwell, then return 2 cards at random from your inkwell to your hand.
Everything the Light Touches: Whenever this character quests, ready all cards in your inkwell.

cards.Name: Ludwig Von Drake - Self-Proclaimed Genius
cards.Flavor_Text: "So you see, there's a dark void at the edge of Lorcana. A complete absence of electromagnetic radiation! What's it made of? I don't know! The light's just gone. Kaput!"

cards.Name: Minnie Mouse - Quick-Thinking Inventor
cards.Flavor_Text: This puts the Frosting Flinger 2000 to shame.
cards.Body_Text: Cake Catapult - When you play this character, chosen character gets -2{s} this turn.

cards.Name: Basil - Practiced Detective
cards.Flavor_Text:
"This case is as good as solved!"
-Basil
cards.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: King Candy - Sweet Abomination
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named King Candy.)
Changing the Code: When you play this character, you may draw 2 cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

cards.Name: Donald Duck - Focused Flatfoot
cards.Flavor_Text: "There's just gotta be one of those chromi-thingies around here somewhere!"
cards.Body_Text: Baffling Mystery: When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Tanana - Wise Woman
cards.Body_Text: Your Brothers Need Guidance: When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character or location.

cards.Name: Tipo - Growing Son
cards.Flavor_Text: "Mom, Mom! I think I'm still growing!"
cards.Body_Text: Measure Me Again: When you play this character, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Belle - Of the Ball
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Ushered into the Party: When you play this character, your other characters gain Ward until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Merlin - Intellectual Visionary
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Merlin.)
Overdeveloped Brain: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may search your deck for any card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your deck.

cards.Name: Vision of the Future
cards.Flavor_Text: "We must repair the Illuminary before it's too late. And we'll need these devices, these chromicons, to fix it."
cards.Body_Text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Royal Tantrum
cards.Flavor_Text: "I am King! King! King!"
cards.Body_Text: Banish any number of your items, then draw a card for each item banished this way.

cards.Name: Ever as Before
cards.Flavor_Text:
Ever just as sure
As the sun will rise
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Remove up to 2 damage from any number of chosen characters.

cards.Name: Hide Away
cards.Flavor_Text:
Fauna: "Oh my! We dropped some . . ."
Merryweather: "You mean you dropped some!"
cards.Body_Text: Put chosen item or location into its player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: All Funned Out
cards.Flavor_Text: "Pretty pathetic, huh?"
cards.Body_Text: Put chosen character of yours into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Medal of Heroes
cards.Flavor_Text: "You have etched in the rock of virtue a legacy beyond compare."
cards.Body_Text: Congratulations, Soldier: {e}, 2{i}, Banish this item - Chosen character of yours gets +2{l} this turn.

cards.Name: Basil's Magnifying Glass
cards.Flavor_Text: "I say, a piece of the Hexwell Crown!" -Basil
cards.Body_Text: Find What's Hidden: {e}, 2{i} - Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Merlin's Carpetbag
cards.Flavor_Text:
"What a way to pack!"
-Arthur
cards.Body_Text: Hockety Pockety: {e}, 1{i} - Return an item card from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Sapphire Chromicon
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Knowledge is eternal."
-Inscription
cards.Body_Text:
Powering Up: This item enters play exerted.
Sapphire Light: {e}, 2{i}, Banish one of your items - Gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: The Great Illuminary - Radiant Ballroom
cards.Flavor_Text: Every surface glows with the joy of celebration.
cards.Body_Text: Warm Welcome: Characters with Support get +1{l} and +2{w} while here.

cards.Name: Merlin's Cottage
cards.Body_Text: Knowledge is Power: Each player plays with the top card of their deck face up.

cards.Name: Stitch - Team Underdog
cards.Flavor_Text: He's not the biggest glimmer on the team, but he still packs a wallop.
cards.Body_Text: Heave Ho!: When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen character.

cards.Name: Jafar - Tyrannical Hypnotist
cards.Flavor_Text: "No one will keep from me the broken crown!"
cards.Body_Text:
Challenger +7 (While challenging, this character gets +7{s}.)
Intimidating Gaze: Opposing characters with cost 4 or less can't challenge.

cards.Name: Simba - Lost Prince
cards.Flavor_Text: "This is my kingdom. If I don't fight for it, who will?"
cards.Body_Text: Face the Past: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Rudy - Groove Disrupter
cards.Flavor_Text: "The Illuminary can't handle this much groove! We have to keep the noise down or it'll fall apart for sure!"

cards.Name: Royal Guard - Bovine Protector
cards.Flavor_Text: "Hey, I've been turned into a cow. Can I go home?"

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Food Fight Defender
cards.Flavor_Text: Underestimating him is a recipe for disaster.
cards.Body_Text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Sleepy - Sluggish Knight
cards.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Name: Kronk - Unlicensed Investigator
cards.Flavor_Text: "Maybe this one's a chromicon. Probably not. I really should have paid more attention when that wizard guy was talking . . ."
cards.Body_Text: Challenger +1 (While challenging, this character gets +1{s}.)

cards.Name: Heihei - Protective Rooster
cards.Flavor_Text: Who's the "boat snack" now?!
cards.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Sneezy - Noisy Knight
cards.Body_Text: Headwind: When you play this character, chosen knight character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2{s} when challenging.)

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Dopey - Knight Apprentice
cards.Body_Text: Stronger Together: When you play this character, if you have another Knight character in play, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

cards.Name: Namaari - Resolute Daughter
cards.Body_Text:
I Don't Have Any Other Choice: For each opposing character banished in a challenge this turn, you pay 2{i} less to play this character.
Resist +3 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 3.)

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Snow White - Fair-hearted
cards.Flavor_Text: Friendship is the best armor of all.
cards.Body_Text: Natural Leader: This character gains Resist +1 for each other Knight character you have in play. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1 for each other Knight.)

cards.Name: Yzma - Unjustly Treated
cards.Flavor_Text: "What do you mean, 'not on the list'?! I told you to always put me on the list!"
cards.Body_Text: I'm Warning You!: During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes a character in a challenge, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

cards.Name: Kronk - Head of Security
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Kronk.)
Are You on the List?: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may play a character with cost 5 or less for free.

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Grumpy - Skeptical Knight
cards.Body_Text:
Boon of Resilience: While one of your Knight characters is at a location, that character gains Resist +2. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)
Burst of Speed: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.Name: Pete - Wrestling Champ
cards.Flavor_Text: He'll have you seeing double.
cards.Body_Text: Re-Pete: {e} - Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card named Pete, you may play it for free.

cards.Name: Sir Ector - Castle Lord
cards.Flavor_Text: "Well, by Jove. Don't just stand there. Raise a glass to my son Kay . . . and may we be rid of the trickster wizard Marvin, or whatever his blasted name was."

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Bashful - Adoring Knight
cards.Body_Text: Impress the Princess: While you have a character named Snow White in play, this character gains Bodyguard. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Name: Arthur - Wart
cards.Flavor_Text:
"That boy's got real spark. Lots of spirit. Throws himself heart and soul into everything he does."
-Merlin

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Happy - Lively Knight
cards.Body_Text: Burst of Speed: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.Name: Simba - Son of Mufasa
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Simba.)
Fearsome Roar: When you play this character, you may banish chosen item or location.

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Doc - Bold Knight
cards.Body_Text: Drastic Measures: When you play this character, you may discard your hand to draw 2 cards.

cards.Name: Arthur - King Victorius
cards.Body_Text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Arthur.) Knighted by the King: When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Resist +2 and can challenge ready characters this turn. (They get +2{s} while challenging. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

cards.Name: Pete - Games Referee
cards.Flavor_Text: "It ain't cheatin' if you're the one makin' the rules."
cards.Body_Text: Blow the Whistle: When you play this character, opponents can't play actions until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Tug-Of-War
cards.Body_Text:
Choose one:
- Deal 1 damage to each opposing character without Evasive.
- Deal 3 damage to each opposing character with Evasive.

cards.Name: When Will My Life Begin?
cards.Flavor_Text: Stuck in the same place I've always been.
cards.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character can't challenge during their next turn. Draw a card.

cards.Name: Duck For Cover!
cards.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Resist +1 and Evasive this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1. They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.Name: Food Fight!
cards.Flavor_Text: "Gawrsh, who ordered the . . . upside-down CAA-AA-AKE?"
cards.Body_Text: Your characters gain "{e}, 1{i} - Deal 1 damage to chosen character" this turn.

cards.Name: Shield of Arendelle
cards.Body_Text: Deflect: Banish this item - Chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Plate Armor
cards.Body_Text: Well Crafted: {e} - Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

cards.Name: Steel Chromicon
cards.Flavor_Text:
"Strong in will, strong in battle."
-Inscription
cards.Body_Text: Steel Light: {e} - Deal 1 damage to chosen character.

cards.Name: Bad-Anon - Villain Support Center
cards.Body_Text: There's No One I'd Rather Be Than Me: Villain characters gain "{e}, 3{i} - Play a character with the same name as this character for free" while here.

cards.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
cards.Name: Seven Dwarfs' Mine - Secure Fortress
cards.Body_Text: Mountain Defense: During your turn, the first time you move a character here, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character. If the moved character is a Knight, deal 2 damage instead.
